member.name: T:ScrewTurn.Wiki.Plugins.PluginPack.Updater
member.summary: Plugin with the sole purpose of removing PluginPack.dll in favor of separate DLLs.

member.name: M:ScrewTurn.Wiki.Plugins.PluginPack.Updater.Init(ScrewTurn.Wiki.PluginFramework.IHostV30,System.String)
member.exception: If is not valid or is incorrect.

member.name: M:ScrewTurn.Wiki.Plugins.PluginPack.Updater.Shutdown
member.remarks: This method might not be invoked in some cases.

member.summary: Specifies whether or not to execute Phase 1.

member.summary: Specifies whether or not to execute Phase 2.

member.name: P:ScrewTurn.Wiki.Plugins.PluginPack.Updater.PerformPhase3
member.summary: Specifies whether or not to execute Phase 3.

member.name: P:ScrewTurn.Wiki.Plugins.PluginPack.Updater.ExecutionPriority

member.summary: Prepares the title of an item for display (always during phase 3).
